description:
Jurika has many powers, but the strangest one of all is that he seems to know everyone’s heart. He knows what each member of the club is thinking, and he’s about to bring those thoughts into the open, whether they want him to or not.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akane, the Mirror, and the End of the Year Sale
Akane-chan to, Kagami to, Saimatsu Bargain
茜ちゃんと, 鏡と, 歳末バーゲン
